name: Teddy
greetingText: Happy birthday to you, sweetheart! Today is all about you, and I want to make it special, although every day is special as long as I am with you. Here's to another year of adventures together. Happy birthday, my girl!
wishText: Happy birthday to you, sweetheart! Today is all about you, and I want to make it special, although every day is special as long as I am with you. Here's to another year of adventures together. Happy birthday, my girl
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
